name: Block Buster (alpha)
description:
Block Buster!  (0.1.1 Alpha)

Nono, this isn't any ordinary breakout game! I promise!

This is my first game in a ready-to-play state. 
For the alpha release there is only 30 levels, with 3 difficulties, each time you complete the  levels it gets harder! 

Right now the core game-play is there, so I'm working on more unique features.
Follow for the latest news, I'll be updating the game a lot in early development!

If you feel stuck, use F2 to advance a stage, or R to reset the stage. A & D to move the paddle, and navigate the menu. Enter to select. Development Goals
  • The ultimate goal is to have 1000 levels!
  • Having various power-ups unseen in other games
  • 4 +  different game-modes offering a unique style of play
Power-Ups!

So far there are 3 power-ups in the alpha.

  • Paddle Plus
  • Multi-Ball Split
  • Ball Splitter
Levels 10/1000

Right now there are 10 levels. Ranging from simple to intermediate.
Every 5th level is a  ~ Coffee Break ~ level, where it's a bit more relaxed with a fun theme.

Levels consist of the following tiles.Breakable, Splitting, Impenetrable, Invisible, and Points Bumper.

Difficulty

Right now there is a progression difficulty. Every time you complete all the existing 10 levels, your difficulty will be increased. Right now the "Game Ending" is once you beat difficulty 3's end-level.

Future Planned Features

Please suggest any features you would want!!!
